title: A tremella-like in situ synthesis of ZIF-67Co(OH)F@Co3O4 on carbon cloth as an electrode material for supercapacitors
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,27831-27842
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04250F, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Shakeel Ahmad, Muhammad Tariq, Zia Ur Rehman, Shanshan Yao, Bing Zhu, Henmei Ni, Muhammad Samiuddin, Khalid Ali Khan, Magdi E. A. Zaki
In this study, a simple in situ technique followed by hydrothermal method is used to synthesize a novel tremella-like structure of ZIF-67Co(OH)F@Co3O4/CC metal–organic framework (MOF) derived from zeolite imidazole.
